hero.title: Accurate, Compliant and Traceable AI in all markets

items.description: Industry specific knowledge graphs are created to classify and map key concepts and their relationships, enabling traceable, bound and more accurate AI model outputs

items.title: Data Labelling and Annotation
items.description: High-quality model training data that is sector and language specific are created though native speaker expert validation and strict labelling quality control

founders.sectionTitle: Meet the founders driving innovation and impact with applied AI.

marco.name: Marco Spinelli
marco.title: Co-Founder & CEO
marco.bio: 25+ years of global leadership, senior management and product development in financial services, launching industry award winning AI/LLM applications, data strategy, and digital transformation. Held senior positions at McKinsey & Co, Morgan Stanley, UBS and Bridgewater. Proven track record of building and scaling large complex organizations, overseeing global teams of 800+ professionals. Advised Fortune 500 CEOs, Central Bankers and Investment Management leaders on innovation and AI strategy. MBA from Wharton and a BSc/MSc in Electrical Engineering from University of São Paulo

mauricio.name: Maurício Lima
mauricio.title: Co-Founder
mauricio.bio: 20+ years in VC and PE. Raised over US$380 million, led 27 investments and 14 exits achieving an average annual return of 30.3% and a multiple of over 4x CoC. Co-founder and CEO of Henkan Investimentos Ltda. Founder of Brazil’s largest B2B tech investment firm, Invest Tech. Current Chairman of Quality Digital and Board Member at SkyOne. Held senior positions at Latinvest, Lloyds Bank, and Banco Itaú. BA from Fundação Getulio Vargas (FGV)

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We accelerate the adoption of AI tools in Emerging Markets and underserved Developed Markets by delivering tailored, real-world solutions.
mission.problemText: Most pre-trained AI models evolve from English language/context data, leaving entire regions under-represented. This is particularly acute in specialty and highly regulated sectors, such as Finance, Health Care and Legal
mission.differenceText: ACT.AI focuses on adapting AI to local realities — from language and infrastructure to business needs. We provide high-quality labeled data, train models in underrepresented languages, and develop scalable B2B applications for regions often overlooked
